```{r}
DC_file <- oe_match("Washington, District of Columbia")

```
```{r}
DC_streets <- oe_read(DC_file$url, 
                   provider = "openstreetmap_fr", 
                   download_directory = "networks", 
                   layer = "lines", 
                   quiet = TRUE) %>%
  filter(!is.na(highway)) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(DC_streets) +

```
```{r}
MD_state_plane <- "+proj=lcc +lat_1=39.45 +lat_2=38.3 +lat_0=37.66666666666666 +lon_0=-77 +x_0=399999.9998983998 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +to_meter=0.3048006096012192 +no_defs"

DC_city_limits <- places("District of Columbia") %>%
  filter(NAME == "Washington") %>%
  st_transform(crs = st_crs(DC_streets))


DC_streets <- DC_streets[DC_city_limits,]

ggplot(DC_streets) +
  geom_sf() +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane) 
```

```{r}
DC_libraries <- oe_read(DC_file$url, 
                   provider = "openstreetmap_fr", 
                   download_directory = "networks", 
                   layer = "points", 
                   quiet = TRUE) %>%
  filter(str_detect(other_tags, '"amenity"=>"library"')) %>%
  st_filter(DC_city_limits) %>%
  rename(id = osm_id)

ggplot(DC_streets) +
  geom_sf(color = 'gray') +
  geom_sf(data = DC_libraries, color = "darkblue") +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane)  +
  theme_void()
```
```{r}
grid <- st_sf(st_make_grid(DC_city_limits, 
                           square = FALSE, 
                           n = c(100,100),
                           what = "polygons")) %>%
  st_filter(DC_city_limits) 

colnames(grid) <- "geometry"
st_geometry(grid) <- "geometry"

grid <- grid %>%
  mutate(id = seq(1, length(grid$geometry), by=1))

grid_points <- st_centroid(grid)

ggplot(grid) +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = DC_libraries, color = "darkblue") +
  geom_sf(data = DC_streets, alpha = 0.2) +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane) + 
  theme_map()
```
```{r}
```


```{r}
r5r_core <- setup_r5("networks", verbose = FALSE)
```
```{r}
ttm <- travel_time_matrix(r5r_core = r5r_core,
                          origins = DC_libraries,
                          destinations = grid_points,
                          mode = c("WALK"),
                          departure_datetime = as.POSIXct("15-03-2020 14:00:00",
                                 format = "%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S"),
                          max_walk_dist = 1000,
                          max_trip_duration = 480,
                          verbose = FALSE)
```
```{r}
tt_wide <- ttm %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = fromId, 
              names_prefix = "from", values_from = travel_time) %>%
  rename(id = toId) %>% 
  merge(grid) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 999) %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(from_any = min(c_across(starts_with("from")), na.rm = TRUE))

st_geometry(tt_wide) <- "geometry"
```
```{r}
ggplot(DC_streets) +
  geom_sf(data = tt_wide, 
          aes(fill = from_any), 
          color = NA) +
  geom_sf(alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_gradient2(low = "green", mid = "yellow", high = "red", 
                       midpoint = 30,
        name = "Transit Travel\ntime to the\nnearest library\n(minutes)") +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane) +
 geom_sf(data = DC_libraries, color = "darkblue") +
   theme_map()
```

```{r}
iso_pallete <- wes_palette("Darjeeling1", n = 5)

iso10min <- tt_wide[tt_wide$from_any < 11,] %>%
  st_union()

iso20min <- tt_wide[tt_wide$from_any < 21,] %>%
  st_union()

iso30min <- tt_wide[tt_wide$from_any < 31,] %>%
  st_union()

iso40min <- tt_wide[tt_wide$from_any < 41,] %>%
  st_union()

iso50min <- tt_wide[tt_wide$from_any < 51,] %>%
  st_union()

ggplot(DC_streets) +
  geom_sf(data = iso50min, 
          aes(fill = "Area within 50 minutes"), 
          color = NA) +  
  geom_sf(data = iso40min, 
          aes(fill = "Area within 40 minutes"), 
          color = NA) +
  geom_sf(data = iso30min, 
          aes(fill = "Area within 30 minutes"), 
          color = NA) +
  geom_sf(data = iso20min, 
          aes(fill = "Area within 20 minutes"), 
          color = NA) +
  geom_sf(data = iso10min, 
          aes(fill = "Area within 10 minutes"), 
          color = NA) +
  geom_sf(alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(iso_pallete[1],
                               iso_pallete[2],
                               iso_pallete[3],
                               iso_pallete[4],
                               iso_pallete[5]),
        name = "Transit Travel\ntime to the\nnearest library\n(minutes)") +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane) +
  theme_map()
```
```{r}
DC_transit <- read_gtfs(file.path("networks", "DCgtfs.zip"))

transit_stops <- st_as_sf(DC_transit$stops, 
                          coords = c("stop_lon", "stop_lat"), 
                          crs =st_crs(grid))
```
```{r}
transit_grid <- grid %>%
  mutate(num_stops = lengths(st_covers(grid, transit_stops)))

transit_points <- st_centroid(transit_grid)

ggplot(transit_points) +
  geom_sf(aes(color = as.character(num_stops))) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("gray", "cornsilk", "lightgreen", "darkgreen", "coral2", "aquamarine1", "cornflowerblue", "cyan", "darkorchid", "goldenrod", "darkorange", "deeppink"), 
                    name = "Number of\ntransit stops") +
  theme_void()
```
```{r}
transit_access <- accessibility(r5r_core,
                        origins = transit_points,
                        destinations = transit_points,
                        mode = "WALK",
                        opportunities_colname = "num_stops",
                        decay_function = "step",
                        cutoffs = 6,
                        departure_datetime = as.POSIXct("15-03-2020 14:00:00",
                                 format = "%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S"),
                        max_walk_dist = 500,
                        time_window = 60,
                        percentiles = 50,
                        verbose = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(id = as.numeric(from_id)) %>%
  merge(grid)

st_geometry(transit_access) <- "geometry"

ggplot(transit_access) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = accessibility), color = NA) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Transit stops\nwithin 5-minutes\nwalk") +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane) +
  theme_void()
```

```{r}
transit_access2 <- accessibility(r5r_core,
                        origins = transit_points,
                        destinations = transit_points,
                        mode = "WALK",
                        opportunities_colname = "num_stops",
                        decay_function = "exponential",
                        cutoffs = 5,
                        departure_datetime = as.POSIXct("15-03-2020 14:00:00",
                                 format = "%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S"),
                        max_walk_dist = 500,
                        time_window = 60,
                        percentiles = 50,
                        verbose = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(id = as.numeric(from_id)) %>%
  merge(grid)

st_geometry(transit_access2) <- "geometry"

ggplot(transit_access2) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = accessibility), color = NA) +
  scale_fill_turbo_c( name = "Accessiblity score") +
  coord_sf(crs = MD_state_plane) +
  theme_void()
```
